articles.author: Chris Liakos, Sophie Tanno, Martin Goillandeau, Larry Madowo
articles.title: ECOWAS orders ‘immediate activation’ of standby force in Niger - CNN
articles.description: West African leaders on Thursday ramped up the rhetoric against Niger’s coup leaders, ordering the “activation” and the “deployment” of a regional standby force to restore constitutional order in the coup-hit country.
articles.content: West African leaders on Thursday ramped up the rhetoric against Nigers coup leaders, ordering the activation and the deployment of a regional standby force to restore constitutional order in the coup… [+5896 chars]
